text: The French Figure Skating Championships () are a figure skating national championship held annually to determine the national champions of France. Medals are awarded in the disciplines of men's singles, ladies' singles, pair skating, and ice dancing. Skaters compete at the senior level. National-level competitions for juniors and novices are held separately. ==Senior medalists== ===Men=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year !
